title: Battlestar Galactica S04E02 720x448 H.264.mp4
description:
This version was made from an upload by hooghlyrocks which was a 1280x1024 HD rip but which was about 850Mb in size. I shrunk it to a very high quality 720 x 448 pixel 16:10 H.264 version, brightened it up a bit, and increased the audio volume by 6dB
The result is this, a video you can play in fullscreen on a 22inch screen and not see any artifacts, and almost as clear as the larger file it was made from. 
Infact, this version is SMALLER in size than the standard XVID rip of 360mB but has a much higher resolution and way better quality.

Plot:
Starbuck (Katee Sackhoff) and Laura Roslin (Mary McDonnell) face off with a gun between them, Lee Adama (Jamie Bamber) says goodbye to the Galactica, violent conflict breaks out between the seven models aboard Cylon Basestar, and Gaius Baltar (James Callis) is directly pulled into the \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Final Five\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" situation.
